entries.title: What to expect at CES 2023, from mondo TVs to EVs
entries.description: Faster PCs, brilliant TVs, and smarter smart homes are all on the horizon, and CES 2023 will be ground zero for the gadgets that will get us there.

entries.title: 12 high-profile tech opportunities for those job hunting
entries.description: If you're looking to start the new year with a new career, ZipRecruiter has everything you need to find high-paying tech opportunities for online job-hunters.

entries.title: Make tech work for you: 10 side gigs to make extra money for the new year
entries.description: Looking for a side gig for the new year? If you're ready to leverage your skills to earn extra cash, read on.
